sense.def:
Kadar neki zapis
circulates
ali
is circulated
, izvodi zapisa potujejo med člani neke skupine ljudi.

seg.quote: The report was circulated to all the members.
A union newspaper was circulating at the congress.

sense.def:
Kadar šala ali govorica
circulates
, ljudje o njej pripovedujejo drug drugemu.

seg.quote: Stories about him circulated at his club.
A wicked rumour had been circulated that she was a secret drinker.

sense.def:
Kadar neka snov
circulates
, se z lahkoto in prosto giblje v zaprtem prostoru ali sistemu.

seg.quote: We are governed by the hormones that circulate around our bodies.

sense.def:
Če človek
circulates at a party
, se sprehaja med gosti in se pogovarja z različnimi ljudmi.
